name: 4x4 Monster Truck off road Stunt simulator games
name_original: 4x4 Monster Truck off road Stunt simulator games
description:
4x4 Monster Truck Stunt

Ready to go for the New Adventure in monster truck,download this 4x4 Off Road Monster Truck Game and Go On The big Mountain with Your truck,Reach Your destination point before your opponent reach,as soon as you reach your destination the next destination will automatically appear,the arrow shows you the right path,This game includes the exclusive collection of the Monster Trucks and the Hill is very tough to be climb.so be ready to do a new things,download this game and make a high score,share your High score with your friends.

Key Features

-> 3D Views Of Mountains

-> Climb Mountain With Effective Monster Trucks

-> Easy Controlling

-> User Friendly Game

and many more things download it now..
